Bone??? Mud Doll??? How do I get these?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, September 29, 2002 - 07:27 pm:

By Lisa Shock on Monday, October 14, 2002 - 04:05 pm:

I now only need to get one item, Fire Orb, besides these two. It's very strange, I keep getting some items very frequently at various levels, the only real problm items (aside from the bone and mud doll) have been that I have never gotten a second Phoenix Feather or a second Mirror. However, I will say that the longer I play and keep resetting, the more items I am getting from stray monsters. -Some of those items I have only seen once now, like MarkisWing and Watrpaint.

By Gizmo the Lemur on Sunday, November 17, 2002 - 07:29 pm:

I used to get at least one or two of those, and sell them (I forgot their value) in one of my old games (the one that wouldn't give me the Dynast fight for some reason). Anyway
